column4: is there an Atheros mini-PCI 802.11 G/N wifi card that is known to work with 12.xx
The is a certified wifi card wiki, but it does not have every one that will work.
I was looking for 1st hand reports cause I used that wiki to pick an intel card, but it has regression bugs in 12.xx
Ah well you will get spanked for polling, just a heads up.
